parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the organization. The value can be up to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitExternalId
parameters.description: The external ID of the organization, which can be used to associate the organization with an external system. By default, the external ID is the organization ID. The value can be up to 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitName
parameters.description: The name of the organization. The name can be up to 64 characters in length.
